summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4199 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Angeline Street to Hudson Street; by the installation of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49934, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
